ygData.subject: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: This Amulet of Order is a fairly good artifact to have!  A few AC, +5 Charisma, and it acts like a lightstone!  I ve been debating whether or not to discard my
ygData.messageBody:
This Amulet of Order is a fairly good artifact to have! A few AC, +5
Charisma, and it acts like a lightstone! I've been debating whether or not
to discard my spiked collar for it (+3 strength) but I'm thinking with
discussions here I'll just start wearing that amulet. Of course, it's a
quest item, but I have a feeling the reward won't be as good as the quest
item itself. (the quest-giver didn't like me much, few levels back when I
just gave it to her, so who knows.)







Spoiler








It comes off the poor undead knight, the one who wacks you over and over and
pleads with you to put him out of his misery, and is fairly easy to put
down... I must have killed him around level five before. Back then, just
don't remember this pendant having the qualities it does now. He is part of
a quest that can be found in the Qeynos temple. He is in the Qeynos
aquaducts. I remember encountering him roaming the main passages before,
but this time I found him -just- behind the secret passage near the "beware
the ratslayer" graffiti. If you go back there, be careful though. Further
in a deathtrap.

Roop
